trans-unit.source: Provides a custom CategoryEditor to use for grouping properties that are displayed in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce CategoryEditor personalizzato da utilizzare per raggruppare le proprietà visualizzate in un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.PropertyGrid"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Determines which properties are edited by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Determina quali proprietà sono modificate dal <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"></xref> instance that is checked to determine whether it is included among those properties edited by the <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.PropertyEntry"> </xref> istanza che viene controllato per determinare se è inclusa tra le proprietà modificate dal <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this editor edits the specified property; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se questo editor consente di modificare la proprietà specificata. in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> for which to create a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref> per cui si desidera creare un nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref> for the specified <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> type.
trans-unit.target: Crea un nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref> per l'oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref> tipo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref> type for which to create the new <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref> tipo per cui creare il nuovo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EditorAttribute"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"></xref> that is hosted by the property inspector to provide the user interface for a <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un <xref href="System.Windows.DataTemplate"> </xref> ospitato dal controllo proprietà per fornire l'interfaccia utente per un <xref href="System.Activities.Presentation.PropertyEditing.CategoryEditor"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Object> that the host can display in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.Object>che consente di visualizzare l'host in un <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The desired [T.Systems.Windows.Size](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) of the image to return.
Gets a localized string that indicates to which category the editor belongs.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene una stringa localizzata che indica a quale categoria appartiene l'editor.

trans-unit.source: Category editors are defined on types and, thus, at load time they need to indicate to which category they belong.
trans-unit.target: Gli editor categorie vengono definiti sui tipi e, pertanto, in fase di caricamento devono indicare a quale categoria appartengono.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that represents the editor category.
